title: Random Lag after the update
body: For the last week and a half I have been getting about 50 more ping than usual for no reason, I have no idea why. Its normal really early in the morning but from midday the rest of the day i have really high ping. I understand there are peak times for internet usage but it was never this bad. Any advice?

replies.body: It sounds like you're probably running into some normal internet slow downs during those peak times, but let's take a few steps just to make sure we can't smooth that lag out a bit. Check out the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and make sure to go through each one. Some may seem a bit excessive, but each step serves it's own purpose. Let me know if that doesn't do too much to help though!
